text: for all those times you stood for me
for all the truth that you made me see
for all the joy brought to my life for
all the wrong that you made right for
every dream you made come true
you gave me faith cause you believed
you gave me your wings and made me fly
you touched my head and i could touch
i lost my faith you gave it back to me
you said no stars out of preach you
stood by me and i was too tall
